Hero.description:
In this noisy era, we have shifted our gaze from the profit statement back to the product itself.

Because we deeply believe: When you wholeheartedly create value for customers, the market will never let down a dedicated creator.

Making good products is the only shortcut.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.subtitle: A legacy of quality and innovation since 1976
AboutPage.subtitle2: Leading the industry with cutting-edge technology, exceptional quality, and unwavering commitment to customer success.
AboutPage.intro: Founded in 1976, Yudong Boiler is a comprehensive high-tech enterprise integrating scientific research, design, manufacturing, sales, and installation. We hold a Class A Boiler Manufacturing License and Class D Pressure Vessel Manufacturing License. With over 40 years of experience, we are a trusted name in the industrial boiler industry.
AboutPage.location: Located in the Zhangji Industrial Zone, Taikang County, Henan Province, China, our state-of-the-art facility covers an area of 60,000 square meters. We are proud to be one of the leading manufacturers in the boiler industry, dedicated to providing energy-efficient and environmentally friendly heating solutions that meet the highest international standards.
AboutPage.commitment: Our commitment to quality is backed by our "Class A" Boiler Manufacturing License and "Class D" Pressure Vessel Manufacturing License. We are also a council member of the China Industrial Boiler Association and a member of the China Welding Association, demonstrating our industry leadership and technical expertise.
AboutPage.team: With a team of over 200 skilled professionals, including experienced engineers and technicians, we combine traditional craftsmanship with modern manufacturing techniques to deliver products that exceed customer expectations.
AboutPage.cert1: Class A Boiler Manufacturing License (Highest Level)
AboutPage.cert2: Class D Pressure Vessel Design & Manufacturing License
AboutPage.cert5: China Industrial Boiler Association Council Member
AboutPage.globalReachDesc: Our products are exported to Southeast Asia, Europe, North America, the Middle East, and beyond. From the freezing plains of Siberia to the tropical factories of Southeast Asia, Yudong Boilers power industries with stable, efficient, and clean thermal energy. We have established comprehensive service networks in key markets to ensure rapid response and localized support.
AboutPage.missionDesc: To provide world-class industrial heating solutions that enhance productivity, reduce environmental impact, and create lasting value for our customers. We are committed to continuous innovation, exceptional quality, and customer satisfaction in every project we undertake.
AboutPage.visionDesc: To become a globally recognized leader in industrial boiler manufacturing, known for our technological innovation, sustainable practices, and unwavering commitment to excellence. We strive to set new industry standards and build long-term partnerships with clients worldwide.
AboutPage.strength1Desc: State-of-the-art production facilities with automated welding, precision machining, and quality control systems.
AboutPage.strength2Desc: Low-NOx emission technology, high-efficiency condensing systems, and sustainable manufacturing practices.
AboutPage.strength3Desc: Dedicated R&D team continuously developing new technologies and improving existing products.
AboutPage.strength4Desc: Rigorous testing at every stage, from raw materials to final inspection, ensuring 100% quality compliance.
AboutPage.product1Desc: WNS series, SZS series, LSS series - from 0.5 to 75 t/h capacity, suitable for various industrial applications.
AboutPage.product2Desc: Low-NOx condensing hot water boilers, pressurized and atmospheric models for heating and domestic hot water.
AboutPage.product3Desc: High-temperature thermal oil systems up to 340°C, ideal for precise temperature control applications.
AboutPage.product4Desc: Environmentally friendly biomass and coal-fired boilers with advanced combustion technology.
AboutPage.product5Desc: Clean and efficient electric heating solutions with PLC control and high thermal efficiency.
AboutPage.product6Desc: Custom-designed pressure vessels meeting ASME, PED, and other international standards.
AboutPage.service1Desc: Expert technical consultation to help you choose the right solution for your needs.
AboutPage.service2Desc: Tailored solutions designed to meet your specific requirements and local regulations.
AboutPage.service3Desc: Professional installation guidance and on-site support from our experienced technicians.
AboutPage.service4Desc: Comprehensive warranty, maintenance support, and spare parts supply for long-term reliability.
AboutPage.facilitiesDesc: Our 60,000 square meter facility houses advanced production lines, quality testing laboratories, and a dedicated R&D center, ensuring we deliver products of the highest quality.
AboutPage.facility1Desc: Modern production lines with automated welding equipment, CNC machining centers, and precision assembly stations. Capable of producing 5,000+ tons of boilers annually.
AboutPage.facility2Desc: Fully equipped testing laboratory with hydraulic pressure testing, ultrasonic testing, radiographic inspection, and material analysis equipment to ensure product quality.
AboutPage.facility3Desc: State-of-the-art R&D facility with CAD/CAM systems, thermal efficiency testing equipment, and a team of experienced engineers developing innovative solutions.
AboutPage.facility4Desc: Organized material storage area with strict quality control, ensuring all raw materials meet international standards before entering production.
AboutPage.facility5Desc: Spacious assembly area for large-scale boiler assembly, equipped with overhead cranes and professional assembly tools for efficient production.
AboutPage.facility6Desc: Comprehensive quality control system with multi-stage inspection points, ensuring every product meets or exceeds industry standards before delivery.

ContactPage.title: Get Your Customized Heating Solution
ContactPage.subtitle: Join 2000+ global clients who trust Yudong Boiler. Contact us for professional sizing advice, efficiency analysis, and factory-direct pricing. 2-hour rapid response.
ContactPage.fillForm: Fill out the form below and we will get back to you within 24 hours.
ContactPage.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your requirements (capacity, fuel type, application)...
ContactPage.thankYouContact: Thank you for contacting us. Our team will review your inquiry and respond shortly.
ContactPage.faq1Q: What is the typical delivery time?
ContactPage.faq1A: Standard models usually ship within 15-20 days. Custom orders typically take 30-45 days depending on specifications.
ContactPage.faq2A: Yes, we send experienced engineers to your site for installation guidance, commissioning, and staff training.
ContactPage.faq3A: We provide a comprehensive 12-month warranty on the boiler body and auxiliaries, with lifetime technical support.
ContactPage.faq4A: Absolutely! We welcome international clients to visit our 60,000m² facility in Henan, China. We can assist with travel arrangements.
ContactPage.faq5Q: What fuel types do your boilers support?
ContactPage.faq5A: Our boilers support a wide range of fuels including Natural Gas, Diesel, Heavy Oil, LPG, Biomass Pellets, Coal, and Electricity. We can recommend the most economical option based on your local energy costs.
ContactPage.faq6Q: What international certifications do you hold?
ContactPage.faq6A: We strictly follow international standards. We can provide ASME, CE (EU), ISO9001, ISO14001, and EAC (Eurasian Economic Union) certifications to ensure compliance with your local import regulations.
ContactPage.faq7Q: How do I choose the right boiler capacity?
ContactPage.faq7A: Don't worry. Just tell us your application (e.g., food processing, textile, heating area) and expected thermal demand. Our professional engineering team will calculate and recommend the perfect model for free.
ContactPage.faq8A: We typically accept T/T (Telegraphic Transfer) and L/C (Letter of Credit). For standard orders, a 30% deposit is required, with the remaining 70% paid before shipment.
ContactPage.faq9A: Yes, we maintain a comprehensive spare parts inventory. We recommend purchasing a set of wear parts with your boiler. For urgent needs, we can ship via international express (DHL/FedEx) to minimize downtime.
ContactPage.faq10A: Yes, we do. We can customize the boiler's color, logo, and control system interface to help agents better develop their local markets.
